coffeeBeans.name: Laura M.
coffeeBeans.text: The aroma is amazing. Since I started grinding beans at home, coffee tastes much fresher and deeper.

coffeeBeans.name: Carlos A.
coffeeBeans.text: Very good flavor and excellent quality. I just wish the packaging was more airtight.

coffeeBeans.name: Sofía P.
coffeeBeans.text: Good coffee, but a bit tricky if you don't have a grinder.

coffeeBeans.name: Andrés G.
coffeeBeans.text: Perfect for French press. I got a full-bodied cup with delicious roasted notes.

coffeeBeans.name: Valentina R.
coffeeBeans.text: Good value for money, though some beans were a bit uneven.

groundCoffee.name: Diego H.
groundCoffee.text: Perfect for quick mornings. Just open, pour, and it's ready.

groundCoffee.name: Camila S.
groundCoffee.text: The flavor is well balanced, ideal for my drip coffee maker.

groundCoffee.name: Julián T.
groundCoffee.text: Loses aroma quickly if not stored properly. Still very practical.

groundCoffee.name: Natalia F.
groundCoffee.text: Comes with a great grind for espresso. I really liked it.

groundCoffee.name: Sebastián L.
groundCoffee.text: Not as fresh as I expected. The packaging could be better.

coffeeCapsules.name: Lucía Q.
coffeeCapsules.text: I love the convenience. Coffee is ready in seconds and always tastes great.

coffeeCapsules.name: Tomás E.
coffeeCapsules.text: Great variety of flavors, but some capsules seem half full.

coffeeCapsules.name: Marcela V.
coffeeCapsules.text: Works perfectly with my Dolce Gusto machine. The aroma is intense.

coffeeCapsules.name: Felipe D.
coffeeCapsules.text: Very practical, but the price per cup is a bit high.

coffeeCapsules.name: Diana M.
coffeeCapsules.text: Perfect for work—no mess, no fuss.

greenCoffee.name: Laura Z.
greenCoffee.text: I use it for detox infusions. Great way to start the day.

greenCoffee.name: Esteban K.
greenCoffee.text: The flavor is odd at first, but it's effective for health.

greenCoffee.name: Paula Y.
greenCoffee.text: I roast it at home and it turns out amazing. You can tell the difference.

greenCoffee.name: Alejandro C.
greenCoffee.text: I expected it to taste more like regular coffee. It’s too herbal.

greenCoffee.name: Daniela N.
greenCoffee.text: Excellent for appetite control. I also recommend it in capsules.
